game.name: MagiClean
game.categories: Single-player, Custom Volume Controls, Mouse Only Option, Playable without Timed Input, Save Anytime, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: A cozy CLICKER where you CLEAN an abandoned WIZARDING SCHOOL. Relax, click away, and watch as dirty, cluttered rooms become sparkling clean. BREW potions, COMBINE ancient scrolls, and COLLECT magical animals. Restore this School of Witchcraft and Wizardry to its former glory in MagiClean.
game.shortDescriptionEn: A cozy CLICKER where you CLEAN an abandoned WIZARDING SCHOOL. Relax, click away, and watch as dirty, cluttered rooms become sparkling clean. BREW potions, COMBINE ancient scrolls, and COLLECT magical animals. Restore this School of Witchcraft and Wizardry to its former glory in MagiClean.
